Text:
what codec or program do I need to play this file?
Ive tried windows media player (no picture, but sound) vlc media player (picture but it flashes), media player classic (only audio). damn.. i really wanna know how I can play this format. 
Help!

The movie is not great but enjoyable watching. Good sound and picture quality. ###To play it you need: MPlayer (http://www.mplayerhq.hu) and FFDShow with ffmpeg support###.
MPlayer is a command line utility, to play a movie you need to type a command like "c:mplayer.exe -fs c:unleashed.mp4".
That is all. I'm gonna seed the movie for a while now.
(PO POLSKU: do obejrzenia filmu potrzebny jest MPlayer (http://www.mplayerhq.hu) oraz zainstalowany FFDShow z obsługą ffmpeg. Tylko taka kombinacja pozwala obejrzeć film, a jest on niezłej jakości pomimo niewielkich rozmiar贸w. Polecam!)
play mp4 with nero, with codecs

Simply use VLC media player 0.8.2

Work like a charm
